hero.title: What is Spec-Driven?
hero.description: Large Language Models excel at divergence, while industrial applications require convergence. Spec is the 'rational shackle' we place on the model, ensuring every output strictly adheres to business specifications.

concept.title: From Natural Language to Strict Specs

steps.label: User Instruction
steps.content: "Book me a flight to Beijing, Air China, economy class, strict policy check."

layers.name: Perception Layer
layers.desc: Multi-modal input processing: text instructions, image recognition, sensor data reading.

layers.name: Reasoning Layer
layers.desc: Spec Engine + LLM Brain. Real-time validation of business logic, rejecting hallucinations, ensuring compliance.

layers.name: Actuation Layer
layers.desc: API connectors, RPA robots, physical device interfaces, translating decisions into actions.

advantages.title: Safe & Reliable
advantages.desc: Any operation deviating from the Spec is instantly intercepted, ensuring the system operates within safe boundaries.

advantages.title: Seamless Integration
advantages.desc: Easily integrates into existing ERP, CRM, OA systems without refactoring existing IT infrastructure.

advantages.title: Low-Code Customization
advantages.desc: Customers don't need to know code; simply define business Specs in natural language to generate dedicated Agents.
